HEADER.Title: Provide information about the blob to be uploaded to storage container

PROMPTSETXUI.XUIEDITOR:
<dialog height="424" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="0" top="0" width="832"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Put Azure Storage Blob"><properties><entry name="text">Put Azure Storage Blob</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties><text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_AZR_CONTAINER_NAMEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="[0-9a-z]{3,63}" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Container name" tooltip="Storage container name length: 3 to 63 characters, numbers and lower-case letters only.
